verses: Born a king on Bethlehem plain, Gold I bring to crown Him again, King forever, ceasing never, Over us all to reign
frankincense to offer have I, Incense owns a deity nigh, Prayer and praising all men raising Worship Him, God most high.
Myrrh is mine its bitter perfume, Breathes a life of gathering gloom, Sorrowing, sighing, bleeding, dying; Sealed in the stone-cold tomb.
Glorious now, behold Him Arise King and God and Sacrifice Alleluia, Alleluia Earth to the heaven replies
